March 20, 2013, Lyle was a client of Andy’s

Andy is extremely helpful, informative, and hard working. He has helped me so much, explaining financial information and details, account management, etc. He is also a very concerned, caring person. He is not just an advisor, he considers you his friend and will work hard to do the best for you. I have recommended him to so many people. I just wish I would have found the Mutual Fund Store and Andy long ago. I would be in a better position right now as far as retirement. He's the greatest!!!Lyle Davidson

summary: As a seasoned Certified Financial Planner®, with over 26 years of experience, I believe success should be measured not just by your financial well-being, but by how confident you feel about your future. Helping my clients reach their financial goals through a personal relationship and knowledgeable advice is what makes me happy. I take the trust and responsibility that they put in me on a daily basis with the utmost of pride, and always do my best to make sure that they are not disappointed. Backed by a team of professionals, I have the resources to support all of your financial needs throughout your life.If you'd like more information about how I can help you, please call me at (210) 826-9400 or e-mail me at ahedrick@financialengines.com
name: Andy Hedrick, CFP®, ChFC®, CLU®, CRPC®, CDFA™
title: Senior Vice President, Financial Planning at Financial Engines®
